about_the_game:
Allows the Warrior of Light and Y'shtola to equip the following items.

* Warrior of Light
- Knight in Shining Armor I (Appearance)
- Knight in Shining Armor II (Appearance)
- Knight in Shining Armor III (Appearance)
- Barbarian's Sword/Aegis (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* Y'shtola
- Scion Sorceress's Robe I (Appearance)
- Scion Sorceress's Robe II (Appearance)
- Scion Sorceress's Robe III (Appearance)
- Nightseeker (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Warrior of Light Starter Pack and Y'shtola Starter Pack before you can use this content.
detailed_description:
Allows the Warrior of Light and Y'shtola to equip the following items.

* Warrior of Light
- Knight in Shining Armor I (Appearance)
- Knight in Shining Armor II (Appearance)
- Knight in Shining Armor III (Appearance)
- Barbarian's Sword/Aegis (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* Y'shtola
- Scion Sorceress's Robe I (Appearance)
- Scion Sorceress's Robe II (Appearance)
- Scion Sorceress's Robe III (Appearance)
- Nightseeker (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Warrior of Light Starter Pack and Y'shtola Starter Pack before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
